Header: PM tells officials to grant immediate relief to disaster victims
Content: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has instructed the officials to implement a special programme to evacuate people from the areas affected by the inclement weather. A discussion was held between the Premier and the officials. The people from nine districts have been affected by the extreme weather. Discussions were held regarding the management of displaced persons and taking adequate precautions to prevent such disaster in the future. The Prime Minister instructed the officials to provide cooked meals and sanitation to the displaced persons without delay. The victims will also be handed over dry rations. The Prime Minister instructed the officials to pay special attention to the victimized children. Ministers, MPs and the Commanders of the tri-forces and the IGP were present at the discussion.
